promo.promoSlogan: A frontend developer from Moscow helping businesses create modern, fast, and user-friendly websites.

about.title: Greeting, new customers!
about.descriptionOne: I am a frontend developer, living in Moscow, seeking exciting work opportunities. With a passion for problem-solving and a strong focus on accessibility, I turn ideas into interactive, user-friendly products.
about.descriptionTwo: To achieve this, I use all modern technologies such as React.js, Webflow, and some design, constantly learning new things to improve my skills. I pay special attention to communication with the team and client to understand needs and propose optimal solutions. Outside of programming, I enjoy football, basketball, hokkey, and learning English language. I'd be glad to discuss your project!

description.one: I craft responsive and intuitive web interfaces using cutting-edge technologies and best practices. My goal is to create websites that not only look stunning but also perform flawlessly across all devices.
description.two: I design user-centric interfaces that prioritize usability and aesthetics, ensuring a smooth and enjoyable user experience. My focus is on creating visually appealing designs that enhance engagement and simplify interactions.
description.three: I optimize websites to improve search engine rankings, driving organic traffic and increasing visibility online. By implementing effective SEO strategies, I ensure your content reaches its target audience and achieves maximum impact.

question_1.name: What services do you offer?
question_1.answer: I specialize in developing responsive web interfaces, creating user interfaces (UI), integrating with backends, optimizing performance, and ensuring cross-browser compatibility.

question_2.name: Which technologies do you use?
question_2.answer: In my work, I utilize modern technology stacks such as HTML5, CSS3/SASS, JavaScript (ES6+), TypeScript, React.js, Next.js, as well as various build tools like Webpack and Git for version control.

question_3.name: How long does it take to develop a project?
question_3.answer: The timeline depends on the complexity of the task and the scope of work. For smaller projects, it may take several weeks, while larger ones could span over several months. I always strive to provide realistic timelines and keep clients informed about every stage of development.

question_4.name: Do you work remotely?
question_4.answer: Yes, I primarily work remotely. This allows me to collaborate with clients from all over the world and maintain a flexible working schedule.

question_5.name: Do you provide support after project completion?
question_5.answer: Absolutely! After completing a project, I offer maintenance and technical support for an agreed-upon period. This includes bug fixes, making changes, and enhancing functionality.

question_6.name: What is your experience level?
question_6.answer: I have more than X years of frontend development experience. Over this time, I've worked on numerous projects ranging from simple landing pages to complex corporate applications. You can view some of my projects in the 'Portfolio' section.

question_7.name: Can I contact you for consultation?
question_7.answer: Certainly! Feel free to contact me through social media, Telegram, or email. I’ll be delighted to assist with any inquiries and provide a project estimate.

footer.description: Creating Intuitive User Experiences Through Clean Code and Modern Design

vamvoda.title: Vam Voda
vamvoda.overview: Water e-commerce store built with featuring dynamic product filtering with virtual scrolling and animated transitions, along with a responsive gallery.

waterdel.title: Waterdel
waterdel.slogan: An e-commerce platform for puryfing systems
waterdel.overview: VodaOnline — a contemporary online store for water purification equipment built with JavaScript, HTML, and CSS. Elegant and intuitive interface helps users quickly select products and place orders.

only.title: Only development studio
only.overview: Only development studio is a team that creates bold and minimalist digital projects with a focus on modern frontend and expressive visuals.

area.title: Digital Studio Area
area.slogan: Landing page for Area development studio
area.overview: A digital design service with a dynamic and impressive interface built on Next.js, TypeScript, and React. Interactive Framer Motion animations and a convenient React Hook Form order form simplify the creation of unique projects.

ratingus.title: Ratingus
ratingus.slogan: A platform to rate any of web apps
ratingus.overview: Ratingus — an objective mobile app evaluation platform crafted with Next.js, TypeScript, and React. Smooth animations by Framer Motion and secure voting process ensured by Yup & Formik validators.

blog.title: Personal Blog
blog.overview: A modern personal blog with lively UI, built on Next.js, TypeScript, and React. Fluid transitions and vibrant effects from Framer Motion immerse readers into the content.

createx.title: Create-x Construction
createx.overview: Kreatex Construction — stylish and functional website for a construction company created using powerful tools like JavaScript, HTML5, and CSS3. Modern design and smooth animations provide an unforgettable user experience.
